#summary Golf Markup Language Documentation: complexType GolfClub.

== Name ==

*[CGolfClub GolfClub]*

  	

===  Super Types ===
{{{
anyType
  |
  +--GolfClub (restriction)
}}}
----
    

===  Documentation ===
        
			Descriptive elements for a golf club.
		
  	
===  Properties ===

  	This component is not nillable.
---- 	
        
===  Model ===

	<...  
            *type = [SGolfClubTypeEnum GolfClubTypeEnum]*
          >  (manufacturer, model, submodel, number?, serial?, [SAngle90 loft]?, [SAngle90 lie]?, weight?, [SSwingWeight swing-weight]?, [CShaft shaft]?  )</...>

----
    

=== Nested Element Summary ===
        
|| [SAngle90 golfml:Angle90] || [SAngle90 lie] ||  					Lie of the golf club.				 ||
|| [SAngle90 golfml:Angle90] || [SAngle90 loft] ||  					Loft of the golf club.				 ||
|| xs:string || manufacturer ||  					Manufacturer of a golf club.				 ||
|| xs:string || model ||  					Model of a golf club.				 ||
|| xs:string || number ||  					Number or name of a club in a set.				 ||
|| xs:string || serial ||  					Serial number of the golf club.				 ||
|| [CShaft golfml:Shaft] || [CShaft shaft] ||  					Shaft of the golf club.				 ||
|| xs:string || submodel ||  					Sub model or type of a golf club.				 ||
|| [SSwingWeight golfml:SwingWeight] || [SSwingWeight swing-weight] ||  					Swing weight of the golf club.				 ||
|| xs:float || weight ||  					Weight of the golf club.				 ||      

=== Attributes ===

|| Name || Description || Type || Use || Default || Fixed || Form ||
        
|| type ||  				Type of golf club.			 || [SGolfClubTypeEnum golfml:GolfClubTypeEnum] || required ||  ||  || unqualified ||

===  Local Usage ===

    	[CEquipmentList EquipmentList], [CGolfBag GolfBag], [CStrokeDetail StrokeDetail]
